about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of Jackie Hart, a paranormal investigator,  as she navigates a chilling mystery set in the shadowy streets and rooftops of modern Taiwan. A gruesome discovery on a hotel roof leads to a tangled web of ritualistic sacrifices, ancient folklore, and unearthly entities each with their own motivations and plans for Jackie.

In this 2D point & click adventure, you'll:

  • Investigate Disturbing Crime Scenes: Examine eerie environments, piece together clues, and reconstruct events to unravel the truth.

  • Engage in Deep, Choice-Driven Dialogue: Interact with a cast of richly developed characters, from skeptical police officers to enigmatic shamans, where your decisions shape the narrative and relationships.

  • Explore Taiwan's Mystical Lore: Delve into indigenous rituals, encounter spirits, and face the terrifying yaoguai, as you uncover secrets rooted in cultural mythology.

  • Strengthen Your Abilities: Meet powerful allies in the world of mysticism and magic who can unlock your latent powers.

What is the secret behind Jackie's powers? Will she embrace the darkness or step into the light? Your choices will determine not only the outcome of the investigation but the fates of those around you.

Key Features:

  • A compelling narrative with multiple dialogue paths and moral dilemmas.

  • Beautifully hand-drawn 2D environments inspired by the rich culture and urban landscapes of Taiwan.

  • Fully voiced by an outstanding cast.

Prepare to be drawn into a world where every choice matters, every clue counts, and every shadow could hide your next threat.

Wishlist now and uncover the truth.

content_descriptors.notes: Static crime scenes of human sacrifice.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

name: Jackie Hart: Headhunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6XX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An urban fantasy 2D point & click adventure set in Taipei, where the supernatural lurks beneath reality. You play as a paranormal investigator with abilities of her own. Unravel a brutal case of human sacrifice, piece together the clues, interview witnesses and try to keep your head—literally.
